Hi,
   
  I need some information regarding JUnit. All I have heard is that JUnit can and is used widely for unit testing the JAVA code. 
  Can the JUnit be used to test the GUI related applications? If so, how can we use it for system testing of GUI applications.
   
   
  Thanks and Regards,
  Suresh
